episodes.title: S03E04 Do Not Question the Prophet
episodes.description: In part 2 of our look at the FLDS Cult (Yeah, I called it a cult), Warren Jeffs becomes the community's  new  president, prophet, seer, and revelator.  He would be arrested just 4 years later, but would his reign of terror end there?Buzzsprout - Let's get your podcast laun Start for FREEDisclaimer: This post contains affiliate links. episodes.title: S03E03 Keep Sweet, or Else!
episodes.description: This is the first part of a 2 part episode concerning the Fundamental Latter Day Saints cult. Today, we'll talk about the origins of the movement and the reign of Rulon Jeffs as President and Prophet. We'll discuss his many wives, children, and his favorite catch phrase, "Keep Sweet, pray and obey", as well as the consequences for not obeying. Buzzsprout - Let's get your podcast laun Start for FREEDisclaimer: This post contains affiliate links.
